org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl

Class StateAwareProductCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.config.ProductCrawlerBean
      • org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.ProductCrawler
        • org.apache.oodt.cas.crawl.StateAwareProductCrawler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CoreMetKeys, SpringSetIdInjectionType

    public class StateAwareProductCrawler
extends ProductCrawler
    ProductCrawler used for testing the appropriated states are entered for each part of the crawler's workflow.
    Author:
    bfoster (Brian Foster)
